Text:
DragonWand is posting these fake 'porn' comments on a variety of recently uploaded torrents. It goes without saying that this upload is 100% legit, and not porn at all. The name TvTeam represents dedication and integrity. Not to mention the green skull should give a clue...

Of 'DragonWand', we know only this:
